channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Glass
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Glass

item.title: CVE-2021-24434|2024-08-03T19:28:23.978Z -- unknown -- glass
item.description: The Glass WordPress plugin through 1.3.2 does not sanitise or escape its "Glass Pages" setting before outputting in a page, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue. Furthermore, the plugin did not have CSRF check in place when saving its settings, allowing the issue to be exploited via a CSRF attack.
